attributes.action: Bring back Christian assembly and Christian holidays to schools
attributes.background: This is a Christian country and while we are living in a modern world and sympathetic to other religions we must not lose what this country was built on. Christian values. These values have shaped us and should continue to

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

It is still a legal requirement for local authority maintained schools to provide a daily act of collective worship of a broadly Christian character. School holidays are a matter for individual schools, but are usually around public holidays. We therefore aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
